title: Clinical Trial Finder | Pancreatic Cancer Action Network
description: The Pancreatic Cancer Action Network's Clinical Trial Finder connects pancreatic cancer patients and researchers with clinical research trials.
cleaned_text: Phase I Study of Neoantigen Vaccines in Pancreatic Cancer in the Window Prior to Surgery Summary The purpose of this phase I study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of neoantigen peptide vaccine strategy in pancreatic cancer patients following neoadjuvant General Information NCT#: NCT05111353 Study ID: 21-x268 Trial Phase: Phase I Trial Sponsor: Washington University School of Medicine Therapies Used
